tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After visiting many doctors finally we met Dr Shilpa Gupta K S. She s very approachable and very knowledgeable. She will explain everything in detail. After thorough investigation we can to know regarding tube problem. With laparoscopy and Hysteroscopy tube problem was cleared. Then I conceived in next month and delivered baby. Now we happy family.

Important points she will never hurry us and she will spend lot of time to explain each and every time. She explains reasons for everything with very good smile. She gives lot of positive energy. I'm glad to meet Dr Shilpa Gupta. In pregnancy and during delivery and after delivery her treatment was very satisfied. 

Thank you Dr shilpa
Highly recommended for everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met Dr. Shilpa gupta for my pcos and infertility. She made me feel comfortable and explained the issue thoroughly after analysing the test reports. She understand the patient very well and try to be in there shoe.Highly recommend her for any women related concerns.Thanks a lot madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After my daughter's 3 Ivf's got failed. We met Dr. Shilpa gupta,  she turned our lucky hand. She is extremely talented,  accurate about treatment plans and dedicated too. We followed the treatment plan and mu daughter got conceived and blessed with a healthy baby girl. One thing I like more is Dr.shilpa is a listen the concerns so calmly and explains the solution accurately. All thanks to Dr.Shilpa gupta for filling  joy and happiness in my daughter life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We approached Dr Shilpa Gupta K S for our prenatal check up and for conception advise. Properly she diagnosed and evaluated us. She guided us very carefully and nicely. We conceived with her simple and effective method of treatment. Pregnancy journey was good with her, high risk pregnancy managed very well. Journey was smooth and safe in her hands. We delivered daughter. We highly recommend her for all women's problem.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Shilpa Gupta is incredibly compassionate and attentive. She took the time to listen to my concerns and explained everything in detail. I felt completely at ease during my appointment and would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a caring gynecologist.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Female Infertility Treatment,Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI),Test Tube Baby\IVF|ICSI,Treatment of polycystic ovarian syndrome(PCOS),
review: Three IVF and two times embryo transfer were failed. After spending so much and not becoming pregnant made me very sad and depression. We met Dr shilpa through my friend. Within first consultation she became very close to us and she took two hour to explain everything in detail. Each and every previous report she checked in detailed. Full examination was done. Reason for failure was explained. She will never give false hopes and negativity. She will give explain eacha nd every step in detail. With great moral support from her we undersent one more IVF but I got very few eggs and only two embryo. Madam td us to do few blood test and few uterus test. Two months she told us to take break. As per advise we did everything. But we were little nervous for only two embryo. She did embryo transfer and everything went as per plan. I became pregnant. My pregnancy was high risk with high BP and high sugar. Every time she used to monitor and she used to reply to our doutds. Now I'm proud parent of twins. Very happy to share my good news and now we are celebrating one year birthday of my kids. Highly highly recommended to everyone. Very happy and satisfied with you madam. Thank you so much for everything.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Congratulations

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Female Infertility Treatment,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Infertility And Pcod,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Infertility in Women,
review: Every girl will have dream to become mother. Inspite of so many scans, tablets and check up and meeting do many Gynecologist I never conceived. I have PCOS problem. We met Dr shilpa gupta. Many doctors instisted me for laparoscopy. But madam denied and she explain regarding PCOS. Every time she will explain each and everything in detail and in simple words. All are words are positive. She spreads positivity wacha nd every time. I underwent tube test and also some medications, injection were given. First month I didn't conceive.  Before I never used to get good egg size and I had egg release problem. Second time I convinced. Her explanation skills and care is ultimate. I'm very happy now I'm 12 week pregnant. Thank you so much madam for all your support. I will never forget you in my life. My whole family is very happy. No unnecessary blood test or surgery madam  will suggest. I'm glad to meet you. Highly recommended for all women problem. She can handle any kind of complications, madam d very dedicated to her work and very good in taking patient care. Very much satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Test Tube Baby\IVF|ICSI,Female Infertility Treatment,Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review:
After many years of marriage our dream came true. We met Dr shilpa in Kavya fertility. We underwnt many cycle of IUI but got failed. Then doctor explained everything about test tube baby. We were very much hesitated to go ahead due to long process but madam made very easy for us. Her approach to the treatment was very very clear and transparent. She will explain everything in detail. First attempt of IVF we conceived but at three months I had abortion and I was really depressed. 
But madam gave full support and always she was replying to our messages . In second time I conceived but again I started having bleeding . Even though we stay very far she used to advice each and everything to me as well as our delivery doctor. Everything will be blessed at correct time this s her sentence. This my real experience with God grace I delivered baby of 3 kg one week back
 Very happy to meet Dr shilpa at correct time and glad I met her. Highly recommended for each and everyone . She spreads positive thoughts to everyone with her great smile. I'm speaking to her since one and half year and still she s same guiding us. Thank you sooooo much for treating me like ur family member
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Congratulations

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Female Infertility Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Test Tube Baby\IVF|ICSI,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Infertility in Women,
review: We married for 15 years and we stay in Canada. One of my friend gave Dr shilpa gupta reference. We took many cycle of IVF and IUI before itself. We left all hopes. Due to my friend force we met her last year. In first ho itself we became very close to her. She s like my own sister and family member whom we can relay upon. Her practical sense and experience was great. She can handle all type of cases. She explained all problems related to me and my husband. We underwent three IVF cycle outside. She explained reasons for IVF failure neatly. We underwent ERA test and then IVF. First embryo transfer itself we got good news but after few months I got aborted. But mam again did embryo transfer the. It was positive. With her help and God grace pregnancy went smoothly. I m very happy with her treatment. Till now I'm in touch with madam. She will reply and respond all our doudts. In this pregnancy we had preterm delivery but baby is fine. We highly recommend Dr shilpa for all infertility patients. Doctor spending time with us and understanding our situation is really important. Picking up the problem is very much required. Thank you so much madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Female Infertility Treatment,Infertility And Pcod,Diagnosis of unexplained infertility,Normal Delivery,
review:
We were trying to conceive from 10years and tried all the possible ways, consulted many doctors. Unfortunately, didn't work out anything for us. We left all the hope, then some acquaintance suggested Dr. Shilpa's name.

We started consulting Dr. Shilpa with the last hope in 2019 based on the feedback we saw in the internet and personal references . Dr. Shilpa's diagnosis was spot on from very first visit. As a couple, we were made very comfortable which helped us discussing the problems openly. Dr. Shilpa is very friendly and very attentive. She ensured we don't lose hope. The way we were advised about the delivery procedure and the confidence induced by Dr. Shilpa is second to none. She always radiates positive energy and make sure her patients stay positive and strong. By following all her advices and treatment, i had a normal delivery in 2020, now we are proud parent of baby boy. I cant thanks her enough.

We will highly recommend Dr. Shilpa Gupta and thank her for helping us became a proud parent. We are sure you wont be disappointed and you will see 100% result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery,Female Infertility Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Test Tube Baby\IVF|ICSI,In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review:
I was diagnosed with huge fibroid. But this was not picked by many gynecologist. I underwent multiple cycle of IVF outside. Through few friends suggestions we met Dr shilpa. That time she informed us regarding low egg count. She did two time IVF and pooled my egg. Then we underwent fibroid removal bu due to lock down k took break. Last year we underwent embryo transfer . In first attempt it was failed but second time we got good news. Well satisfied with her treatment and approach. She will never rush and she will accept our decisions , everything will be explained before itself. Now I'm 7 month pregnant and doing well. Highly satisfied and highly recommended for all infertility cases. 
To meet such humble , down to earth and friendly doctor is very difficult. Happy to meet her. My life has been changed from her. We will never forget her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review:
There will be a lot of pressure and stress when we don't conceive. That itself is negative thought then we meet so many hospitals and also we spend a lot of money that again increases our stress same happened to me.

We married for 14 years and went through a number of scans, injections, and all. Two years back I met Dr. Shilpa, she s the one who spends so much time with patients and she will explain everything in detail. Mam explained to us to go for one more cycle of IUI and it was negative. But somewhere I had a lot of hopes with mam treatment. Next cycle we underwent IVF and we preserved our embryos. Due to lockdown, we couldn't go for embryo transfer. Later we went for embryo transfer In August month. It went smoothly and I delivered a baby boy. All thanks to mam.
She gives full positive energy and all-time she will receive our call and she will reply. Happy to share my positive story

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Female Infertility Treatment,Test Tube Baby\IVF|ICSI,Recurrent Pregnancy Loss,In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review: Thank you so much Dr shilpa for fullfilling our dream. Now I am six month pregnant and doing fine becz of Dr shilpa. I met her before last year as per my friend suggestions. She is very polite and down to earth. She will explain all complications before itself.  Even unnecessary injections and test she will avoid. We both had problem for conception and every time she used to take time and explain very well. This is the best thing that happened to me till now. We highly recommend Dr shilpa for all infertility patients. I happy to be mom now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Doctor Shilpa is very friendly, good hearted person and very polite. First delivery we had cesearean section means LSCS. This time inspite of previous caserean we had normal delivery. Mam will be available all time and she will come for all emergency. Now my wife is very well and she is fine. Inspite of COVID pandemic she took all precaution and care of my wife. We highly recommend Dr shilpa for all pregnant and women related problem. Infact she explained regarding side effects and all alternative method of contraception. She will follow up daily. Thank you so much. Such a relaxation after meeting you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Female Infertility Treatment,Infertility And Pcod,Diagnosis of unexplained infertility,Normal Delivery,
review: Dr Shilpa is boon for many women who wants to conceive. Her passion towards work is great. We married six years back and visited many doctors in many hospital. Underwent multiple IUI cycle but all result were negative. We met madam in 2020 underwent IVF .  We got beautiful result with first attempt itself. For pregnancy also we visited Dr shilpa. She manage us very well, she s very clear and she will explain issues very patiently. My pregnancy was complicated like high Blood pressure but madam handled very smoothly. I am very thank full to her. It's god gift we delivered male baby and now baby is three months. During IVF not only finance matter even emotion plays a lot. With her positive attitude we could continue everything. I used to feel happy and safe in her hand. We highly recommend Dr shilpa for all gyn related and infertility treatment.

review: We are very happy with Dr Shilpa treatment. We are trying for conception since 5 years. Visited many hospital and underwent many treatment. After consulting Dr shilpa with first IVF itself we conceived. Now we delivered baby boy through normal delivery.  Dr shilpa is very clear, transparent and ethical in treatment, she s very friendly and always keen to help patients. She will attend call all time. Will definitely recommend Dr shilpa for all patients for all gynec problems and for all infertility  patients.

Confidence is something that one lacks while facing certain issues. She gave me the confidence that I needed and helped me a lot. She is very friendly and I feel very comfortable while talking to her. She is very professional and always puts my safety first. I would definitely recommend Dr. Shilpa for a gynaecologist
reply_text: Thank you and congratulations for the pregnancy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am thrilled to be seven weeks pregnant, and can’t imagine being in this position without Dr. Shilpa Gupta. She is truly an exceptional doctor. Initially I thought that conceiving would be a struggle, but Dr. Shilpa Gupta quickly reassured me that I had numerous options, and that she was fairly confident that I would be able to get pregnant. Beginning my infertility treatment was extremely overwhelming, Dr. Gupta was amazing during the whole process. As we worked our way through several failed attempts at getting pregnant, Dr. Gupta continued to be extremely supportive, caring, and positive. She patiently answered our numerous questions, and thoroughly addressed all of our concerns. Never once making us feel rushed. Her attention and dedication was the same high level during all consultations. She made both my husband and myself extremely comfortable during a stressful situation. She is incredibly knowledgeable and patient. I would strongly recommend her to any family and friend, without hesitation. She truly is an exception doctor, and human being.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. Congratulations both of you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Exactly a week before my travel to another country, I got tested +ve after taking self prega test. We are surprised and not actually ready to conceive the baby at that moment. We then found Dr. Shilpa on practo and decided to visit her clinic after seeing +ve reviews on her profile. As we are running out of time, Dr. Shilpa suggested us to go for surgical abortion and explained us the  treatment process in detail. Doctor is so friendly, I have lots of doubts and she answered to all of them patiently. My surgery went well and it just took 15-25 mins, as I was given anesthesia, I am kept under observation for few hours.  I am satisfied with treatment and I didn't faced any difficulties like over bleeding or cramps during my long travel day. And post treatment after a month I approched Dr. Shilpa once again, as my monthly period didn't show up on time,I was little worried. But she said post abort, body takes time to develop harmones and nothing to worry about this. After 40 days of my surgery I got my menses and I am all good.  I suggest to visit this doctor for gynecological problems.

reply_text: Sorry for your inconvenience. It was follow up consultation with reports. Reasons and all medication was explained with diagram. Everything explained in both languages. Infact all precautionary measures was advised. It was clear from your side also regarding the issue. Doctor was held with another very badly bleeding patient. Emergency patients we have to attend within minutes. Same thing was explained to you very well. Hope for your speedy recovery. We don't ask for patient to pay during follow up. Our service is open for 24 hours and even you have our team number. U would have reached us for any query. To  answer your doudts we called you and doctor will take all patients concern even in emergencies. Our whole team work for this

review: We moved to Hyderabad . Many cycle of IVF was done in Bangalore but never succeeded. Due to less egg I asked dr shilpa to go for IVF but mam suggested for one last cycle of IUI. Believe her completely and she can handle everything . With one attempt itself I got positive result. She will never ask too many tablets or too many tests. Only necessary she will ask. I'm glad to meet her. She got magic hands and very talented person. Highly recommended for all patients. She will be carrying smile always in her face
